org.radix.common.ID

Class AID

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.radix.common.ID.AID

  • public final class AID
extends java.lang.Object
    An Atom ID, made up of 192 bits of truncated hash and 64 bits of a selected shard. The Atom ID is used so that Atoms can be located using just their hid.

    • Field Summary

        public void copyTo(byte[] array,

        Copies this AID to a byte array with some offset. Note that the array must fit the offset + AID.BYTES.
        Parameters:

        offset - The offset into that array
